sentences.en: An anxious or depressed person can experience a really bad trip.
sentences.cn: 焦虑或抑郁的人吸毒后可能会有非常糟糕的幻觉。
英国不景气的房产市场

sentences.en: He was feeling guilty and depressed, repentant and scared.
sentences.cn: 他感到内疚、沮丧、后悔和害怕。

sentences.en: He was more than usually depressed by problems at work.
sentences.cn: 工作上的问题使他异常沮丧。

sentences.en: He was punch-drunk with fatigue and depressed by the rain.
sentences.cn: 他疲惫不堪，头昏沉沉的，因为下雨情绪也很低落。

sentences.en: I left eventually at six o'clock feeling utterly dispirited and depressed.
sentences.cn: 我一直到6点才极度沮丧和郁闷地离去。

sentences.en: I was a bit depressed by our apparent lack of progress.
sentences.cn: 我对我们看似缓慢的进展感到有些沮丧。

sentences.en: I was depressed at the thought of all the hard work ahead.
sentences.cn: 想到有那么多艰苦的工作要做，我就发愁。

sentences.en: I'm depressed by the bovine enthusiasm of the crowd's response.
sentences.cn: 人群毫无热情的迟钝反应使我感到很沮丧。

sentences.en: Jackson said her boss became increasingly depressed and reverted to smoking heavily.
sentences.cn: 杰克逊说她的老板情绪越来越低落，又开始拼命抽烟了。

sentences.en: My bulging thighs and flabby stomach made me depressed.
sentences.cn: 我大腿太粗，肚子上也净是赘肉，让我很发愁。

sentences.en: The construction industry is no longer as depressed as it was.
sentences.cn: 建筑业不再像以往那样萧条了。

sentences.en: The divorce left him deeply depressed .
sentences.cn: 离婚使他变得非常消沉。

sentences.en: They found her walking alone and depressed on the beach.
sentences.cn: 他们碰见她独自一人神色忧郁地走在海滩上。

sentences.en: They often seem depressed and close to emotional breakdown.
sentences.cn: 他们经常显得很沮丧，精神濒于崩溃的边缘。

sentences.en: Warm winds make many people feel enervated and depressed.
sentences.cn: 暖风让很多人觉得乏力沮丧。

sentences.en: When depressed, they dramatically overindulge in chocolate and sweets.
sentences.cn: 情绪低落的时候，她们就疯狂地猛吃巧克力和糖果。

sentences.en: You have no idea how depressed it made me.
sentences.cn: 你都想象不出这事令我多么沮丧。

words.tran_cn: 抑压者；抑压物；压板；降肌
使沮丧；使萧条（depress的过去式和过去分词形式）；压低

trans.tran_cn: 情绪低落的，沮丧的，萧条的，下陷的，低的，中间凹下的
trans.tran_en: an area, industry etc that is depressed does not have enough economic or business activity

trans.tran_cn: 压下(depress的过去式和过去分词)，使愁苦，降低（价格），使跌价
